pageContext.claim: “The W.H.O. really blew it. For some reason, funded largely by the United States, yet very China centric. We will be giving that a good look. Fortunately I rejected their advice on keeping our borders open to China early on. Why did they give us such a faulty recommendation?”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. funding accounts for 15 percent of the World Health Organization’s total funding, which while significant, does not mean the organization is “largely funded” by the U.S.
